module.p: An Eaglais Stèidhichte The Established Church is an ergonymic name-description.

section.p:
Examples from modern usage –
Nuair a thàinig an Dealachadh (1843) agus a dh’fhàg mòran dhen t-sluagh an Eaglais Stèite, chuir an Eaglais Shaor a cuid sgoiltean fhèin air chois.
When the Disruption came (1843) and many of the people left the Established Church, the Free Church set up its own schools. td. 193

Examples from modern usage –
Rinneadh tomhas dhen obair sin [modh-litreachadh na Gàidhlig a leasachadh] fo sgèith Seanadh Earra-Ghàidheal anns an Eaglais Stèite.
A certain amount of that work [developing the orthography of Gaelic] had been done under the aegis of the Synod of Argyll in the Established Church. td. 193
